entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , High River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
